|logo|

APOGEEBrain
==================

Abundance determination for APOGEE optical spectra.

Authors
-------

- **David Nidever** (Montana State University)
  
Installation
------------

To install the latest version::

    pip install git+https://github.com/dnidever/apogeebrain

    
Documentation
-------------

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/apogeebrain/badge/?version=latest
        :target: http://spyderwebb.readthedocs.io/

See `the documentation <http://apogeebrain.readthedocs.io>`_ for information on how
to install and use APOGEEBrain.
